entry.title: Ukraine to Try Russian Soldier for War Crimes
entry.content: A Russian soldier now in Ukrainian detention will be the first to stand trial for alleged war crimes, Ukraine’s prosecutor-general said. The news came as Ukrainian officials accused Russian troops in Ukraine of shipping grains and produce critical to the Ukrainian economy to Crimea.

entry.title: China's Forgotten Premier Steps Out of Xi's Shadow as Economic Fixer
entry.content: Premier Li Keqiang is helping to press the president to dial back policies that have contributed to the economy’s slowdown. He also wants to influence the selection of his own successor.
